column1: Little Goat Diner////As for the actual coffee
column2: I was brought here by my cousin who loves Stumptown Coffee. To his knowledge
column3: this is only one of two shops in the Chicago area that serves Stumptown. I got a macchiato and it was very good. My cousin got the drink of a day
column4: which was named after a famous person
column5: and that was also very good.
